alert.note: Alert for Lycoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 2:57PM EDT until September 07 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lycoming County in north central Pennsylvania... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 257 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Jersey Shore, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Williamsport, Montoursville, Muncy, Hughesville, Montgomery, Duboistown, Elimsport, Cogan Station, Ralston, Cammal, English Center and Trout Run. This includes Interstate 180 near mile marker 10, and from mile markers 12 to 29. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this severe thunderstorm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
